name: project-team-dashboard-widgets
title: Project Team Dashboard Widgets
description: A set of dashboard widgets for managing project teams. The set includes widgets for viewing and managing project team members.

widgets.name: Project Team
widgets.description: Displays a list of users who are members of a project team.

widgets.name: Access Eraser
widgets.description: Quickly restrict user access rights by revoking memberships in groups and teams, revoking project roles, or deleting credentials.
